Package turtlekit.simulations.soccer

Class Summary
Ball the ball
BluePlayer blue player
Player the abstract class that defines the basic behaviors of all turtles who are soccer players
RedPlayer red player
Soccer only a test simulation with an basic IA for players.
SoccerObserver Observer for the playground initialization, and (in the future) it will be the refere
SoccerViewer SoccerViewer changes the turtle display to obtain a tiny player insteed of a rect,
